summary: Grandpa tells Littlefoot about their mythical hero called the Lone Dinosaur. Sarah gets two little lively cousins to take care of. Later, the kids accidentally chip the lucky Saurus Rock, and need to fix it before the bad luck hits.
cast: Thomas Dekker|Kenneth Mars|Anndi McAfee|Aria Noelle Curzon|Jeff Bennett|Nancy Cartwright|Sandy Fox|Miriam Flynn|John Ingle|Danny Mann|Kris Kristofferson
title: En busca del valle encantado 6: El secreto de la Roca del Saurio
